# Intro to GAMS for location and scale

- Can model both the mean and variance based on the covariates.
- Effectively fit a list of models
- This is useful so that you can model the whole distribution. For example with predictions
- Accuracy of the fit can also be improved if the weight of each obsercation is inversely proportion to the variance.
